oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ad for George W. McKissack
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Claiming Space
Work
Advertisements; African American business enterprises; Bricklayers; Contractors
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An advertisement for George W. McKissack, published in the Nashville Globe Friday July 3, 1908. According to the ad, McKissack was a contractor, builder, and "practical bricklayer" for "some of the most substantial buildings in the city."
